title: coolest champion ive made up please release
body: all i ever wanted was a knight bruiser melee champ. garen sword is too big, kayle is an angel, leona is a support and has magic sun power, aatrox is some edgy darkin, fiora sword is too skinny and tryndamere sword bigger than my poo. I want a champ that has sick armour like the marauder skins and his sword to just be a normal looking sword that two handed. He is a little tanky and his ultimate is where he rides a big azz horse and hes really fast. btw he HAS to have nice armour. release pls. that image is from for honor.

replies.body: Ok but like if you want riot to release such a generic looking champion you've gotta give some amazing backstory and a kit that wouldn't need changing like at all for implementation into the game as it currently stands. This colloquial paragraph will not cut it.
